text: yaayyuha l-nasu in kuntum fi raybin mina l-baʿthi fa-inna khalaqnakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma min ʿalaqatin thumma min mud'ghatin mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum wanuqirru fi l-arhami ma nashau ila ajalin musamman thumma nukh'rijukum tif'lan thumma litablughu ashuddakum waminkum man yutawaffa waminkum man yuraddu ila ardhali l-ʿumuri likayla yaʿlama min baʿdi ʿil'min shayan watara l-arda hamidatan fa-idha anzalna ʿalayha l-maa ih'tazzat warabat wa-anbatat min kulli zawjin bahijin
